001/*

006
007package renderer.models_TP;
008
009import renderer.scene.*;
010import renderer.scene.primitives.*;
011import renderer.scene.util.MeshMaker_TP;
012import renderer.scene.util.MeshType;
013
014/**
015   Create a solid model of a disk
016   in the xy-plane centered at the origin.
017<p>
018   See <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Disk_(mathematics)" target="_top">
019                https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Disk_(mathematics)</a>
020
021   @see DiskSector
022*/
023public class Disk extends Model implements MeshMaker_TP
024{
025   public final double r;
026   public final int n;
027   public final int k;
028   public final MeshType type;
029
030   /**
031      Create a disk in the xy-plane with radius 1,
032      with 12 spokes coming out of the center, and
033      with 6 concentric circles around the disk.
034   */
035   public Disk( )
036   {
037      this(1, 6, 12);
038   }
039
040
041   /**
042      Create a disk in the xy-plane with radius
043      {@code r}, with 12 spokes coming out of the
044      center, and with 6 concentric circles around
045      the disk.
046
047      @param r  radius of the disk
048   */
049   public Disk(final double r)
050   {
051      this(r, 6, 12);
052   }
053
054
055   /**
056      Create a disk in the xy-plane with radius
057      {@code r}, with {@code k} spokes coming out
058      of the center, and with {@code n} concentric
059      circles around the disk.
060   <p>
061      If there are {@code k} spokes, then each circle around
062      the center will have {@code k} line segments.
063      If there are {@code n} concentric circles around the
064      center, then each spoke will have {@code n} line segments.
065   <p>
066      There must be at least three spokes and at least
067      one concentric circle.
068
069      @param r  radius of the disk
070      @param n  number of concentric circles
071      @param k  number of spokes in the disk
072      @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code n} is less than 1
073      @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code k} is less than 3
074   */
075   public Disk(final double r, final int n, final int k)
076   {
077      this(r, n, k, MeshType.HORIZONTAL);
078   }
079
080
081   /**
082      Create a disk in the xy-plane with radius
083      {@code r}, with {@code k} spokes coming out
084      of the center, and with {@code n} concentric
085      circles around the disk.
086   <p>
087      If there are {@code k} spokes, then each circle around
088      the center will have {@code k} line segments.
089      If there are {@code n} concentric circles around the
090      center, then each spoke will have {@code n} line segments.
091   <p>
092      There must be at least three spokes and at least
093      one concentric circle.
094
095      @param r  radius of the disk
096      @param n  number of concentric circles
097      @param k  number of spokes in the disk
098      @param type  choose between striped and checkerboard triangle strips
099      @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code n} is less than 1
100      @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code k} is less than 3
101   */
102   public Disk(final double r, final int n, final int k,
103               final MeshType type)
104   {
105      super(String.format("Disk(%.2f,%d,%d)", r, n, k));
106
107      if (n < 1)
108         throw new IllegalArgumentException("n must be greater than 0");
109      if (k < 3)
110         throw new IllegalArgumentException("k must be greater than 2");
111
112      this.r = r;
113      this.n = n;
114      this.k = k;
115      this.type = type;
116
117      // Create the disk's geometry.
118
119      final double deltaR = r / n,
120                   deltaTheta = 2 * Math.PI / k;
121
122      // An array of vertices to be used to create line segments.
123      final Vertex[][] v = new Vertex[n][k];
124
125      // Create all the vertices.
126      for (int j = 0; j < k; ++j) // choose a spoke (an angle)
127      {
128         final double c = Math.cos(j * deltaTheta),
129                      s = Math.sin(j * deltaTheta);
130         for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) // move along the spoke
131         {
132            final double ri = (i + 1) * deltaR;
133            v[i][j] = new Vertex( ri * c,
134                                  ri * s,
135                                  0 );
136         }
137      }
138      final Vertex center = new Vertex(0,0,0);
139
140      // Add all of the vertices to this model.
141      for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
142      {
143         for (int j = 0; j < k; ++j)
144         {
145            addVertex( v[i][j] );
146         }
147      }
148      addVertex( center );
149      final int centerIndex = n * k;
150
151
152      // Create all the triangle strips.
153      if (MeshType.HORIZONTAL == type)
154      {
155         for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; ++i) // choose a circle of latitude
156         {
157            final Primitive triStrip = new TriangleStrip();
158            for (int j = 0; j < k; ++j) // choose a line of longitude
159            {
160               triStrip.addIndex(   i * k + j); // v[i  ][j]
161               triStrip.addIndex((1+i)* k + j); // v[i+1][j]
162            }
163            triStrip.addIndex(   i * k + 0); // v[i  ][0]
164            triStrip.addIndex((1+i)* k + 0); // v[i+1][0]
165            addPrimitive(triStrip);
166         }
167      }
168      else if (MeshType.VERTICAL == type)
169      {
170         for (int j = 0; j < k - 1; ++j) // choose a line of longitude
171         {
172            final Primitive triStrip = new TriangleStrip();
173            triStrip.addIndex(centerIndex);
174            for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) // choose a circle of latitude
175            {
176               triStrip.addIndex((i+0) * k + j);    // v[i][j  ]
177               triStrip.addIndex((i+0) * k + j+1);  // v[i][j+1]
178            }
179            addPrimitive(triStrip);
180         }
181         final Primitive triStrip = new TriangleStrip();
182         triStrip.addIndex(centerIndex);
183         for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) // choose a circle of latitude
184         {
185            triStrip.addIndex((i+0) * k + k-1);  // v[i][k-1]
186            triStrip.addIndex((i+0) * k + 0);    // v[i][0  ]
187         }
188         addPrimitive(triStrip);
189      }
190      else // MeshType.CHECKER triangle strips
191      {
192         for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; ++i) // choose a circle of latitude
193         {
194            for (int j = 0; j < k - 1; ++j) // choose a line of longitude
195            {
196               addPrimitive(
197                  new TriangleStrip(  i * k + j,       // v[i  ][j  ]
198                                   (1+i)* k + j,       // v[i+1][j  ]
199                                      i * k + j + 1,   // v[i  ][j+1]
200                                   (1+i)* k + j + 1)); // v[i+1][j+1]
201            }
202            addPrimitive(
203               new TriangleStrip(  i * k + k - 1, // v[i  ][k-1]
204                                (1+i)* k + k - 1, // v[i+1][k-1]
205                                   i * k + 0,     // v[i  ][0]
206                                (1+i)* k + 0));   // v[i+1][0]
207         }
208      }
209
210      if ( MeshType.HORIZONTAL == type
211        || MeshType.CHECKER == type )
212      {
213         // Create the triangle fan at the center.
214         final Primitive centerFan = new TriangleFan();
215         centerFan.addIndex(centerIndex);
216         for (int j = 0; j < k; ++j) // choose a line of longitude
217         {
218            centerFan.addIndex( j ); // v[0][j]
219         }
220         centerFan.addIndex( 0 ); // v[0][0]
221         addPrimitive(centerFan);
222      }
223   }
224
225
226
227   // Implement the MeshMaker_TP interface (four methods).
228   @Override public int getHorzCount() {return n;}
229
230   @Override public int getVertCount() {return k;}
231
232   @Override public MeshType getType() {return type;}
233
234   @Override
235   public Disk remake(final int n, final int k, final MeshType type)
236   {
237      return new Disk(this.r, n, k, type);
238   }
239}//Disk
